bow: what the weirdest or worst pregnancy advice you received post from babybumps what kinds of unsafe impractical or outright strange things have well meaning friends and relatives told you during your pregnancy working on an article about the pregnancy advice women have gotten over the past century so if you have any stories of what your mother grandmother or other woman you know was advised please share that breastfeeding will give me breast cancer whatever you re craving eat say well it not like going to go out and drink 20 martinis because craving that ha ha nope they were like oh have bottle of gin ll get you going uhhhhhhhhh no do lift anything heavier than gallon of milk while pregnant with my second yeah the year old was definitely over that limit was told wrist magnets would get rid of my morning sickness rubbish do jump you ll shake the baby was thinking about this earlier my toddler is 32lbs and 26 weeks along not sure how would pick him up worst for inducing labour is to drink castor oil my blood actually boils when see people recommend that cousin believed that the babies umbilical cord was attached to her belly button and so did tough it or wash it for her entire pregnancy because it could cause it to detach have no idea if someone told her that or if she just pulled it out of thin air but she was pretty freaked out that washed mine on my due date at the nail salon to cheer myself up because wanted him out delightful woman in the chair next to me said should go straight to the hospital because her friend did have her baby by her due date and the baby died and she kept going would let it go and we barely spoke the same language so did feel equipped to debate just mm hmmed and nodded along quite the opposite several studies have shown that it might reduce your risk of breast cancer although results have been inconsistent http ww5 komen org breastcancer notbreastfeeding html my friend at the time was smoker was her dd to the bars one night and she asked if she could smoke cigarette looked at her and said no pregnant she followed up with it okay to smoke or drink in your first trimester some women do even know they are pregnant until the second trimester anyways she tried telling me this on two separate occasions at first was like haha that funny but then thought about it and was more like no that kind of sad should have bought her an anatomy book for her shower knew that but my ex insisted he knew better ve learned to disbelieve everything until can do my own research lol not true unless proven otherwise kind of thing some of the parenting advice people give is straight up crazy haha deleted deleted do stand next to the microwave heartburn means hairy baby did get any heartburn and had hairy baby maybe the baby was sick wtf my kid has fat neck in utero must have downs syndrome your craving fruit must be softy taking bath will infect the baby was told ca eat chocolate when breastfeeding um fuck that that my acute chest clenching damn near rib cracking diaphragm splitting several minutes long coughing spasms that were triggered if dared to speak for more than few seconds at time and would start up about an hour after eating ensuring that could never keep any food down would hurt the baby because he wo even notice the movement that one came from my ob gyn who quickly became my ex ob gyn for failing to realize that lack of oxygen and food might just possibly be problem had severe but very well managed gestational diabetes people kept encouraging me to eat sweets decline saying why oh little wo hurt um yeah it actually might also id rather not have 10lb baby my mother in law yelled at me for raising my arms above my head she told me would wrap the cord around the baby neck my sort of friend did this when she was 35 weeks pregnant was also pregnant just week behind her and could believe she did it and when she had to be flown to bigger hospital about an hour away because her baby was ready and did have strong enough lungs she still refused to tell the doctors she took castor oil though her boyfriend was there when she did it she hid it in smoothie then told him afterwards and he also found the bottle so we all knew what she did she had to stay in the hospital till her due date and ended up delivering at 37 weeks sorry for the long comment just hate when people suggest castor oil whaaaaaaaaaaaat definitely would not have survived the first few months if that were the case heard some real dumb shit living with my ex in laws the only one my brain held onto was if you think of something yucky or if something gives you chills do touch your body anywhere cause that where the baby will get birth mark what the fuck it does nothing but give you diarrhea diarrhea is not labor got this one too so odd my mother insists that every women needs an episiotomy and that just how they do things these days um no only months pregnant but really do want an episiotomy someone worked with young somali guy said that if you crave something you should eat it because otherwise the baby will have birthmark shaped like the unsatisfied craving my youngest should be covered in birthmarks shaped like tacos and strawberry margaritas can not eat bananas too poky will hurt the baby also can not hold or use nails too many other good ones but all forgotten because they were so ridiculous immediately wrote them off old chinese se asian lore ask folks from these types of backgrounds if you want to hear the really crazy stuff the hospital where live does everything possible to avoid them they re only used as last resort now almost would have preferred one though because feeling uhh things tear was not feeling ll ever forget had one with my first it was too bad stitches did need it when had my twins it definitely hurt more after my first baby was born but they gave me good pills was told that if crossed my legs too often that the umbilical cord would get tangled around the baby uh no no it wo feel your pain there people would bring me sweets because was pregnant talking brownies cupcakes cookies wanted all of it could eat it only if was willing to be in diabetic coma and since was had to decline but it still happened constantly to avoid honey utter nonsense got this one too it made me really upset ended up losing it and yelling at her for even suggesting that would accidentally kill my child got this one as well as well as bending over would hurt the baby my mother swears that 26 years ago when she was pregnant with me that she was cautioned against doing both things and so was my grandmother when she was pregnant too for all know doctors could ve really believed that was an issue for pregnant women back then but it so odd that she still believes it to this day heartburn=hair really wanted this one to be true even if it did make sense did have heartburn with my first and she came out bald and now 24 weeks with and ve had hellacious heartburn the whole time what was the problem if may ask well it held true for me had terrible heartburn the whole pregnancy and then the baby came out with whole mop of hair they said it would fall out and she be bald for while as most babies are nope always had full head of long hair oh course my mom tells me that all her kids had long hair like my baby and she never had heartburn so take it all with grain of salt it just tears heal better and faster than cuts something to do with the fibres nerves tearing naturally rather than straight severed cuts haha ate so many samoas the other day got ta love having girl scouts in the house that my son remarked that the baby must be drinking chocolate milk they were pretty par for the course thirty years ago but nowadays they re not my doc to said he done about five in his twenty year career friend of mine was weeks overdue and her midwife suggested she take castor oil she ended up breaking rib her contractions got so strong and after 60 or so hours of labor had an emergency section because her poor son got stuck they re both fine now but yeah kinda turned me off the idea of castor oil there is some truth to this apparently the thing that causes hair to grow also causes heart burn heard about on npr when they tried to debunk the myth here the actual study http www jhsph edu research centers and institutes johns hopkins fetal development project materials publications heartburnhairfinal pdf they heal better and stronger as well think zipper episiotomy scars are as strong did castor oil worked amazing 41+4 days fast labour no gi distress no chemical augmentation for some it is good safe choice did and it was great way better than my pitocin induction at almost 42 weeks with my oldest wrong very wrong castor oil is good choice for some it not the castor pop fault your friend is little mental they used to always do them because they supposedly helped reduce tears turns out the opposite was true and the rate of much worse tears increased why on earth would he think that had he heard how it reduced risk and somehow got it muddled inverted in his mind or did he not want you to breastfeed and was trying to invent reasons why my mother in law swears she did this successfully for one of her sons only she regretted it later because he was born just before the new year instead of just after and that apparently completely wrecked his chances for sporting teams at school as he was the youngest rather than the oldest or something had one and also tore in about three places however it all healed incredibly quickly and do even remember any pain or stinging afterwards the problem is we only hear about the disaster stories when we read up on this stuff the worst can happen sure but the chances are that it wo have no idea we had split before we knew was pregnant and never got back together he was deployed to kuwait the day went into labor and had moved out of state anyways he is the brightest bulb lol and have to wonder why ever dated him gt can not eat bananas too poky will hurt the baby how the fuck does this advice giver eat bananas themself deep throat and swallow them whole oh dear sure most of us have had few of those at least he was around to harass you with his doubtless wonderful knowledge of newborn care had so many people tell me nightmare stories about birth and dead babies it was like they thought well she ca go back now let tell her the worst of the worst actually they have found link between heartburn and more hair it does guarantee you ll have hairy baby though or at 41+4 you were just good to go and vomiting usually could think of nothing worse than going through forced labour with the shits and vomming this is what do understand so excited to meet their baby they will put their and their baby life in danger with you it angers me it not it outright fucking dangerous at 42 weeks you re gon na go with or without castor oil my doctor said she only did something like 100 as episiotomies was that one huge headed baby hours of pushing it was that bad actually was super sqeamish nervous all the nerve endings are spread out so you would really feel much anyways it was such relief because my son was born one push after uh oh somebody who says this *feels sheepish* sorry thought it might be silver lining for preggo friends suffering with heartburn oh very thankful also thankful have full custody and do have to deal with him chose to not file for child support so do have to talk to or see him gotten cold virus something or other which had irritated my upper airway badly enough that the lingering cough was just making the irritation worse which made me cough more which made the irritation worse lather rinse repeat got put on couple rounds of antibiotics that did need because there was no infection got chest rays that did need because my lungs were 100 clear which told my doc repeatedly then after my husband screamed at the doc for failing to properly care for me and our unborn child she pulled some strings and got me an emergency appointment with pulmonologist who put me on steroid inhaler within couple of weeks everything was fine good for you had several miscarriages before my successful pregnancy woman from work told me that they had probably been caused by my cats and should get rid of them or else miscarry again read on another thread that some woman was convinced if she crossed her legs her baby would be able to breathe had an episiotomy with baby and tore with baby the tear hurt so much less and healed so much faster than the episiotomy it was insanity mine did the same thing she was super adamant and pushy about it too no was and at 42 weeks you get switched to an obstetrician castor oil worked in the span of an afternoon left to my own devices think gestate quite bit longer they just do let you now it too risky castor oil has its uses it better than pit yeah bet that why experienced prudent midwives registered provincially encourage it in some circumstances no the circle jerk re castor oil here is interesting yeah have two late december babies one due dec 18 two tbsp of castor oil drops lemon verbena apricot juice and almond butter smoothie and she was born on the 28th it was that or switch to an ob at 42 weeks or induce another way done weeks of stretch and sweeps every old wives tale under the sun after my first due july born july 15 with horrible pit induction like hell when was pregnant was working at an office home and the owners had not not but cats and had cat of my own at my place pregnancy was perfect could have asked for anything better they vaguely tried to do the sweep thing with me but it was too uncomfortable in the end was induced and it was pretty painful but very quick all worth it in the end of course there is small study that shows it actually may induce labor http www ncbi nlm nih gov pubmed 10631825 have birthmark that looks similar to mouse it all makes sense now they are not recommended anymore for reasons tears heal better and many times are smaller and cause less damage than an episiotomy would have eating tropical fruits while pregnant will cause early labor heard this twice actually first from an indian woman who said it only dangerous for white people the second time was from pregnant chinese woman at my shower and she was appalled that the other pregnant woman and would risk our babies over some pineapple chunks maybe in america certainly not in the uk for good reason yes yes you are eat all the fish you can to make labor easier eat seaweed to make sure the baby has lots of hair girls steal their mother beauty so if you have acne or other symptoms that make you less beautiful you will have girl got to 42 weeks and had zero signs of labour no mucus plug no contractions no waters nada had to be induced and even that was slow as hell all right ll bite what the danger glad everything worked out sorry you had to suffer so long and require male intervention so frustrating deleted cats can sometimes be carriers of listeria so emptying sandbox should be done really carefully if you are pregnant and have cat it would be bit too much to get rid of them though listeria can lead to miscarriages or damage to the fetus other sources are unpasterised cheeses smoked fish deli meat that has not been heated over 70 celsius increased rate of baby passing meconium in utero therefore risking mec aspiration risk that weird if someone has dry cough hanging on more than weeks after they came down with the original bug and have no other symptoms anymore give them an inhaler to use twice day myself nurse midwife you do not need pulmonologist for that normally accept that your medical knowledge and experience would be able to identify what really necessary and what is but your specialty is pregnancy not lungs this was just dry cough that hung on the inflammation had gotten so bad that it had gone into full on spasms that had me doubled over coughing so hard my ribs felt like they were going to break literally could not speak for more than seconds at time because the vibrations of my larynx and increased air flow out were triggering the irritation which would set off the spasms lasting between and 15 minutes the pulmonologist said albuterol was absolutely the wrong thing to give me needed the anti inflammatory properties of the steroid inhaler because once the inflammation came down the irritation could heal and the spasms would subside worst was constantly told to slow down and take it easy if your healthy and your dr is on board staying active is the best was to feel better post baby an episiotomy is the one thing worried about happening in labor would much rather tear naturally then have someone cut me because they re impatient ouch ouch ouch get nervous just thinking about it know technically all doctors recommend not eating raw fish or deli meat that has been heated etc etc but really was crazy about all of that women in asian countries have been eating raw fish during pregnancy for so long do know how so many people survived when everything pregnant women come into contact with is bad wow thank you so much for all the responses these are all awesome just follow up question though is most of this advice from the 2000s and 2010s if you have advice from an earlier decade either given to you or somebody you know could you please let me know when it from well maybe he does but he has so many that it covers his whole entire body and you ca tell haha do eat ramen please ve seen college students richer than me
